titleStmt.title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie perceiueth that not withstandyng her commaundment lately publyshed for the ceassyng of certaine vayne and vntrue reportes touchyng a decrye of moneyes ...
Proclamations. 1562-03-13
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Church yarde, by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation against false reports of decrying money.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis.
